title: Application Process of Instructional Design Models for Digital Educational Material Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and fundamental understanding of educational material development
context.additional_context: A course optimized for bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environments, designed for in-service science professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically develop digital educational resources in science by applying instructional design models (RPM or DCM).
Learners can enhance problem-solving skills and critical thinking competencies through team-based projects.
Learners can establish an implementation plan for applying developed digital resources to real educational settings.

resources: Digital content creation tools (Canva, H5P, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
